answers:
First, Apify offers a number of ready solutions that can be launched in minutes with zero or very little coding skills. I tested several of them and they work well. 
Second, it's easy and quick to get custom solutions built if needed. I got a custom solution made in less than a week. 
Plus, their support team is just amazing (shoutout to Tsveta!).
I discovered Apify less than a month ago and it's already one of the core tools in my stack.
Nothing really. It took me some time to get the outcomes I was looking for, but it's a new category of tools to me so it's understandable.
I am scraping several websites to power my lead generation process. Without Apify, I'd have to use VAs, which would be less convenient and more time-consuming.
